bibl.title: Taposiris Magna, 1998-2004. Alexandriai Magyar Ásatások. [En hongrois et en anglais.]
bibl.biblScope: nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul., cartes, plans.
bibl.note: Preface. - Introduction. - Excavations of Evaristo Breccia [Archive of Breccia's excavations at Taposiris Magna - Pisa University], 1905-1907. - Excavations of the Temple, 1998-2004. - Reconstruction of the Sanctuary, 2001-2002, by Gyula ISTVÁNFI. - Treasures of Isis: The Ritual Artefacts, 21.10.2001. - The Cultic Statue, 28.10.2000; 01.02.2003. - The Relics of the Monastery, 1905-2004. - Treasures of the Basilica, 04.02.2003. - The Architectural Plans of the Monastery, 2003-2004, by Imre MAKOVECZ. - Epilogue.
